source.interface:
<implements name="Ring" /> <implements name="GroupMultiplicative" />
* This interface represents an algebraic structure in which the operations of * addition, subtraction, multiplication and division (except division by zero) * may be performed. It is not required for the multiplication to be * commutative (non commutative fields are also called division rings * or skew fields). Jean-Marie Dautelle 3.0, February 13, 2006
* Wikipedia: Field (mathematics)
